pages.text: Perks are applied to the ${item}Perk Slot${0}. A ${item}Perk Slot${0} can accept a single type of perk. An empty ${item}Perk Slot${0} can take any level I perk. All previous levels of perk must be applied before the next level is accepted. Different tiers of factory have a maximum level of perk that they will work with.
Higher tier perks can be applied to lower tier factories, however the factory will ignore any perk benefits over its level capacity.
